https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dZCWRFJnwyxYOhzAhf7Xyru4moB.jpg The great King Gurumes is searching for the Dragon Balls in order to put a stop to his endless hunger. A young girl named Pansy who lives in the nearby village has had enough of the treachery and decides to seek Muten R≈çshi for assistance. Can our heroes save the village and put a stop to the Gurumes Army? Dragon Ball: Curse of the Blood Rubies
